The claim was widely shared on WhatsApp: with a screenshot of the misleading message being provided as evidence.
The claim attributes the information to: based news organization, CNN, but a keyword search on both Google and the CNN website yielded no results for the alleged report.
The claim mentions Dr: Li Wenliang, a Chinese doctor who died from COVID-19, and suggests that he had proposed a cure using tea. However, there is no evidence or research to support this claim, as confirmed by Dr. Jayaruwan Bandara, director of the Sri Lanka Medical Research Institute.
